scripts.all: npm run ss & npm run mr & npm run er & npm run yss
scripts.bible:fix: python3 BibleRefsFixer/bible_refs_fixer.py --mode interactive --input ResultParse/SS/SS+.json --books-mapping BibleRefsFixer/bible_books_mapping.json --history BibleRefsFixer/bible_refs_history.json
scripts.bible:auto: python3 BibleRefsFixer/bible_refs_fixer.py --mode auto --input ResultParse/SS/SS+.json --books-mapping BibleRefsFixer/bible_books_mapping.json --history BibleRefsFixer/bible_refs_history.json
